name: Guerrilla:GorillaGORILLA!
description:
Time to go APE S**T! Blast away at the" X" Army with your Cap Peelers..or whatever you want to call them..while sliding your way into glory on a giant banana peel! 

Will be available for free download in the iOS App store on 5/29!

Art Direction, Character Design: Rikyo, Studio Painted Blade
